We love good food

Top

Book a table

Join us in this beautiful building, immortalised by James Joyce in Ulysses, and we will treat you to great music, friendly staff and above all great food. All of our food is cooked to order using the finest of ingredients. Every soup, sauce, parfait, chutney & jam is made in-house by our talented Chefs, who leave nothing to chance.

Book a table
×

About us

Located just 10 minutes from Dublin city centre in the leafy suburb of Drumcondra, our chefs serve familiar favourites with a twist; for breakfast, lunch and dinner, creating a friendly neighbourhood vibe.

Gift Card

Gift someone special a wonderful experience at Restaurant 104. Whether it’s dining and wine, lunch or long brunches - this gift is bound to delight!

Buy Gift Card

Our customers can't live without us

We had food last night for my 40th lockdown birthday. Everyone was so happy with there food. We had burgers, tikka masalas and chicken wings. Highly recommend restaurant 104 and will definitely be in to have a meal when you are back open. Thank you Lynette
We had the family meal from the takeaway menu. I had the Asian chicken burger which was absolutely delicious. the others all had chicken burgers which everyone enjoyed. Plenty of chips and wings. Great service (ready bang on time), delicious food and good value for money Fionnuala
We have just had a lovely meal here. We are staying local to go a concert tomorrow night. The food was amazing and my husband was in his element to a cheese board on the menu . The meal the service everything about this restaurant is excellent. We will come back to Dublin to just come back here. Highly recommended 100% top rated. Liz
